pageContext.claim: “Now we're sending many of them to sanctuary cities. Thank you very much. They're not too happy about it. I'm proud to tell you that was actually my sick idea.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump takes credit for a policy that the White House originally said was only briefly considered by lower-level aides. The Department of Homeland Security has yet to announce the sanctuary cities plan, and funding and legal issues surrounding such a policy have yet to be resolved.
